      • setDelegateAccessibleContextToWrappedComponent

        public void setDelegateAccessibleContextToWrappedComponent(boolean delegateAccessibleContext)
        Enables delegating the AccessibleContext implementation of this panel to the first (and only) component contained in this panel. By delegating to the inner component, we essentially remove this panel from the Accessibility component tree. The reason we need this is that many screen readers don't always know how to deal with labels wrapped in panels. For example, they expect items of list boxes or combo boxes to have the AccessibleRole.LABEL as well as some text.

      • getAccessibleContext

        public javax.accessibility.AccessibleContext getAccessibleContext()
